page.title: 08Sunday morning.
page.content: I wake up much later than normal on Sunday,usually at about half-past nine or ten o'clock.After that I go downstairs and have my breakfast which consists of cereal, toast and orange juice. After breakfast I prepare to go to the Indian Temple which is the only place for our religion to worship.Everybody in our family goes to the temple.We usually leave at about eleven o'clock. Sometimes we have our lunch at the temple which is free. We come home and usually read or watch television. At home we usually use the English language, but at the Temple we use Indian.We always go to the Temple on Sunday
